docs.snippet: Maryland cornerback Dexter McDougle spent most of last season as a spectator, but that did not dissuade the Jets from drafting him in the third round....
docs.lead_paragraph: Maryland cornerback Dexter McDougle spent most of last season as a spectator, but that did not dissuade the Jets from drafting him in the third round.
docs.abstract: New York Jets third-round pick of cornerback Dexter McDougle not only adds speed, ball skills, versatility and instincts to the secondary, but also adds a smart player who is a natural player-coach.

headline.main: Third Pick Gives Jets an Unofficial Coach
headline.print_headline: Third Pick Gives Jets an Unofficial Coach
